roleset.name: offer an oppinion judgement,or to criticize

example.name: transtitive
example.text: Hong Kong director Stanley Kuan echoes this sentiment, * saying that many films by Taiwanese directors tackling cultural identity and critiquing status quo, couldcould never have been made * in Hong Kong, perhaps because of distortions effected * by colonial education, or due to political or commercial considerations.
